description:
Dynamic Analysis for Detecting Endianness Bugs.

Endicheck is a Valgrind tool to help you detect missing byte-swaps in your program.

It is recommended to use --prefix to install into other-than-default location, since you typically do not want to replace your system's installation of Valgrind. Endicheck still contains all the original Valgrind tools, like MemCheck, but it might not contain all the latest updates or distribution patches.
name: Endicheck
